title: Fredrik Haren's One World. One Company. Book Cover
content:
Would appreciate help in identifying the fonts used.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/7103qC14GKL_4178._AA1500_.jpg)

Font: 

 Frutiger's Didot, Trade Gothic (Condensed No.18), Alternate Gothic No3 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112249/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [7103qC14GKL.\_AA1500\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112249/http:/typophile.com/files/7103qC14GKL._AA1500_.jpg) | 62.56 KB |
author: adriana10105

comments.content: "One World. One Company" is **[Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112249/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Didot%20LT%20Roman%20-%20Regular&fid=4be062de99f76f44b9fdff3b04901847&fsize=60&text=One%20World.%20One%20Company.&wrap=2)** by Adrian Frutiger [probably the Linotype version]

"FREDRIK..." "AUTHOR...", "How some of the best..." look like **[Trade Gothic (Condensed No. 18)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112249/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Trade%20Gothic%20LT%20Com%20-%20Condensed%20No.%2018&fid=03a470d6c3503d9f447afccc127ffa50&fsize=48&text=FREDRIK%20HAREN%20AUTHOR%20How%20companies%20becoming%20global%20should%20you&wrap=2)**

"THE IDEA BOOK..." (and the rest bold text) is set on another font (I can't find it)

Thanks so much fvilanakis!

Still need to ID 'THE IDEA BOOK'.
